title: Pagetype Manual content
description: Description of the content of the Pagetype 'manual'

text.description: The text shown on the Page

channel.description: Because the user cant continue to the next page on this pagetype, this property is the identifier thats shown in the continue Button on the Adminpage

eeg.description: Will send a trigger to the eeg if set to 'trigger'

img.description: Filename of the image. Has to have the file ending included. Possible endings are 'mp4', 'jpg', 'jpeg', 'png'

imagePosition.description: Sets the position of the image on the Page
